desc: Annual Monastery of the Holy Spirit bakes goods sale at Saint Jude the Apostle Catholic Church including fudge, biscotti, honey, coffee and fruitcake.

layout.text:
The website is now CLOSED.
All orders will be delivered to your doorstep, for FREE, next Saturday Dec 4th or Sunday Dec 5th (weather permitting) by a volunteer
Thank you for your continued support!
Merry Christmas!!!
